FROM t_role_info r WHERE r.f_sys_del_state = 1
AND r.f_code LIKE CONCAT(#{roleCode}, '%')
AND r.f_desc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{roleDesc}, '%')
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_role_permission_rela rp INNER JOIN t_permission_info p ON p.f_id = rp.t_permission_info_id AND p.f_sys_del_state = 1 WHERE r.f_id = rp.t_role_info_id AND rp.f_sys_del_state = 1
AND p.f_code LIKE CONCAT(#{permissonCode}, '%')
AND p.f_desc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{permissonDesc}, '%')
)
